statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_recommendations WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM healthcare_recommendations WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_recommendations ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM healthcare_recommendations WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM healthcare_recommendations WHERE LENGTH(medical_history) > 500;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_recommendations ORDER BY patient_name DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM healthcare_recommendations WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM healthcare_recommendations
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM healthcare_recommendations WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%'
SELECT patient_name, predictive_model_output FROM healthcare_recommendations ORDER BY predictive_model_output ASC
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, health_condition FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, gender, health_condition FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM Recommendations WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, health_condition FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female' LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, first_name, age, health_condition FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC
SELECT Patients.first_name, Recommendations.recommendation_text FROM Patients JOIN Recommendations ON Patients.patient_id = Recommendations.patient_id ORDER BY Patients.last_name
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM PredictiveModels WHERE accuracy > 0.8
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE date_recorded >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%';
SELECT model_id, model_name, algorithm_used FROM PredictiveModels WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY accuracy DESC, last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, medical_history FROM Patients WHERE age > 40;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords WHERE doctor_name='Dr. Smith';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT Patients.patient_id, patient_name, count(*) as num_records FROM Patients LEFT JOIN HealthRecords ON Patients.patient_id = HealthRecords.patient_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_id, patient_name;
SELECT prediction_date, predicted_diagnosis, confidence_level FROM Predictions WHERE confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY confidence_level DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, HealthRecords.diagnosis, Medications.medication_name FROM Patients JOIN HealthRecords ON Patients.patient_id = HealthRecords.patient_id JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.patient_id WHERE HealthRecords.diagnosis LIKE '%Infection%';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, medical_history->'diagnosis' AS diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT recommendation_text, timestamp FROM Recommendations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM Predictions WHERE prediction_result->>'prediction' = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Recommendations JOIN Patients ON Recommendations.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE Patients.age < 30;
SELECT Patients.patient_id, Patients.patient_name, Predictions.prediction_result FROM Patients JOIN Predictions ON Patients.patient_id = Predictions.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, chat_text FROM Patients JOIN ChatLogs ON Patients.patient_id = ChatLogs.patient_id WHERE Patients.gender = 'Male';
